markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mending Lattice](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2983)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=721" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=709" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 266 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 525 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to a shield or weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32))</row></row>

 

**Trigger** The affixed item would take damage

**Requirement** You are trained in Crafting
</row>

</column>

---

This lattice of reinforced iron is shaped into a perfect octagon. When you activate it, it negates the damage and instantly and completely repairs the affixed item.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Mending Lattice
